content: surprise your graduate with a cute owl to hold his/her glasses this eyeglass holder will look great in the dorm room or in your own bedroom crochet instructions include link to youtube video on the crocodile stitch finished item measures approximately 4 5 tall by 4 5 wide excluding wings pattern works up quickly in one evening using heavy worsted weight yarn great stash buster as it uses only about 3 ounces per holder make up a few in different colors for gifts but be sure to keep one for yourself so you won t lose your glasses any more materials required approximately 3 5 oz worsted weight yarn size g crochet hook yarn needle fiberfil pantyhose plastic eyes 40 mm
